habitat.climate: Temperate, with frequent mist and crystal formations
habitat.terrain: Underground caverns and glittering crystal formations

appearance.color: Iridescent blues and purples, with a soft, luminescent glow
appearance.size: Average adult length: 3.5 meters, with a wingspan of up to 6 meters
distinctive_features: Delicate, crystalline structures on its wings
A soft, ethereal glow emanating from its body
Long, slender limbs with sharp, crystalline claws

abilities.primary: The ability to harness and manipulate crystal energy
abilities.secondary: Enhanced senses, including sight, hearing, and smell
abilities.limitations: Vulnerability to dark magic and intense sonic vibrations

behavior.patterns: Nocturnal, with a tendency to gather in large groups during full moons
behavior.social_structure: Matriarchal, with a complex social hierarchy and strict rules of conduct

favorite_foods: Glimmerblooms: rare, glowing flowers found only in Aethoria's Crystal Caves
Starlight fish: a type of bioluminescent fish found in the caves' crystal-clear waters

lore.origin_story: According to legend, the Luminawing was born from the crystal formations of Aethoria's Crystal Caves, imbued with the magic of the land

legends.title: The Luminawing's Gift
legends.summary: A young Luminawing is said to have gifted a human with the ability to see into the crystal formations, allowing them to unlock the secrets of the caves

legends.title: The Great Migration
legends.summary: A massive migration of Luminawing is said to have occurred, with the creatures traveling across the land to reach a new, hidden crystal formation
